short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dropout but it saves your volume and subtitle settings. It also adds Watch Parties.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension that makes the Dropout streaming service remember your volume settings and enabled subtitles. Once installed, volume changes and subtitle settings will be persistent and no longer reset whenever the page is reloaded or a different video is played.

Additionally, this addon allows creating watch parties in Dropout, allowing you to easily watch videos in sync with your friends.

Currently available features:
- Save current volume and playback rate settings for other videos
- Save currently selected subtitle track and subtitle font/style settings
- Watch Parties: Synchronize your friends video players with yours to watch content perfectly in sync
- Scheduled watch sessions: Synchronize everyone's video players based on a fixed starting time: Useful for large scheduled watch parties, e.g. on community Discord servers
